title: The Gift
creator_credit: Jodine Stodart, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: In 2005, Jodine Stodart travelled to Oxfam Australia to India. It was there that she met a unique lady, not much older than herself, that would leave a lasting impression on the young traveller.
creator_credit_for_label: Jodine Stodart, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
